schema:name: Emissions of greenhouse gases from natural resources, waste and fluorinated gases in England, 1990 to 2022

schema:creator.schema:name: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

schema:author.schema:name: Department for Energy Security and Net Zero

schema:isBasedOn.schema:headline: Greenhouse Gas Inventories for England, Scotland, Wales & Northern Ireland: 1990-2022

schema:variableMeasured: CO2 equivalent; Emission estimate displayed using the standard IPCC global warming potential conversion factors
notes: No data are available for 1991 to 1994 inclusive, 1996 and 1997.

columns.name: year
columns.schema:description: The year range for the data present

datatype.format: Agriculture|Fluorinated gases|Net emissions from land use & land use change|Net removals by forestry sink|Net total including forestry sink|Waste

columns.name: sector
columns.schema:description: National Communications nomenclature used for sector groupings, with customised edits using Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) standard international code format groups used for emission inventories.

columns.name: value
columns.schema:description: CO2 equivalent; Emission estimate displayed using the standard IPCC global warming potential conversion factors
